scripts.install:all: npm install && cd coffeecraft-shell && npm install && cd ../react-joaoMoreira && npm install && cd ../angular-carlosValencia && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../Vue-JoseSarabia && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:shell" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:angular" "npm run start:vue"
scripts.build: npm run build:shell && npm run build:react && npm run build:angular && npm run build:vue
scripts.copy-microfrontends: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='react-joaoMoreira/dist';const dest='coffeecraft-shell/dist/react';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});require('fs-extra').copySync(src,dest,{overwrite:true});" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='angular-carlosValencia/dist';const dest='coffeecraft-shell/dist/angular';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});require('fs-extra').copySync(src,dest,{overwrite:true});" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='Vue-JoseSarabia/dist';const dest='coffeecraft-shell/dist/vue';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});require('fs-extra').copySync(src,dest,{overwrite:true});"
